Experience.title: Software Development Engineer

Designed and developed a cloud-based server-less web application providing Json schema observations in time series by Java 8 and TypeScript.
- Implemented a Json schema watch service using AWS ECS to save observations such as frequency of Json field type, statistics including min, max, average in AWS Timestream database.
- Built a Java library to integrate data stream handler with Json schema watch service and process data by converting raw data notification from AWS SQS to schema observations in cache.
- Developed a front-end webpage to display schema observations in time series charts by React.

Impact: It helps Alexa scientists to create downstream transformation processes to gracefully handle the data field structure. Data consumer could have access to the evolution of their data’s schema over time. It allows customers to root cause issues without having to manually search logs and pull individual data objects out of Datamart just to figure out what happened to a certain field.
